mapper.select: select tid, station_name, train_class_name, start_station_name, end_station_name, station_train_code, is_enabled, start_time, arrive_time, station_no, stopover_time, create_time, datachange_time from station_stop_info where tid = #{tid}

select tid, station_name, train_class_name, start_station_name, end_station_name, station_train_code, is_enabled, start_time, arrive_time, station_no, stopover_time, create_time, datachange_time from station_stop_info where station_train_code = #{trainNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into station_stop_info(station_name, train_class_name, start_station_name, end_station_name, station_train_code, is_enabled, start_time, arrive_time, station_no, stopover_time, create_time, datachange_time) values (#{stationName}, #{trainClassName}, #{startStationName}, #{endStationName}, #{stationTrainCode}, #{isEnabled}, #{startTime}, #{arriveTime}, #{stationNo}, #{stopoverTime}, #{createTime}, #{datachangeTime})

insert into station_stop_info(station_name, train_class_name, start_station_name, end_station_name, station_train_code, is_enabled, start_time, arrive_time, station_no, stopover_time, create_time, datachange_time) values
(#{entity.stationName}, #{entity.trainClassName}, #{entity.startStationName}, #{entity.endStationName}, #{entity.stationTrainCode}, #{entity.isEnabled}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.arriveTime}, #{entity.stationNo}, #{entity.stopoverTime}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.datachangeTime})

insert into station_stop_info(station_name, train_class_name, start_station_name, end_station_name, station_train_code, is_enabled, start_time, arrive_time, station_no, stopover_time, create_time, datachange_time) values
(#{entity.stationName}, #{entity.trainClassName}, #{entity.startStationName}, #{entity.endStationName}, #{entity.stationTrainCode}, #{entity.isEnabled}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.arriveTime}, #{entity.stationNo}, #{entity.stopoverTime}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.datachangeTime})
on duplicate key update station_name = values(station_name), train_class_name = values(train_class_name), start_station_name = values(start_station_name), end_station_name = values(end_station_name), station_train_code = values(station_train_code), is_enabled = values(is_enabled), start_time = values(start_time), arrive_time = values(arrive_time), station_no = values(station_no), stopover_time = values(stopover_time), create_time = values(create_time), datachange_time = values(datachange_time)
mapper.update:
update station_stop_info
station_name = #{stationName},
train_class_name = #{trainClassName},
start_station_name = #{startStationName},
end_station_name = #{endStationName},
station_train_code = #{stationTrainCode},
is_enabled = #{isEnabled},
start_time = #{startTime},
arrive_time = #{arriveTime},
station_no = #{stationNo},
stopover_time = #{stopoverTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
datachange_time = #{datachangeTime},
where tid = #{tid}
